data.event: The name Greenmount came into existence in 1848 when the Sunday School was built.
The name Greenmount came into existence in 1848 when the Sunday School was built.
At first, people who lived near to the Sunday School included the name of Greenmount in their address and gradually this was extended to the surrounding area and so Greenmount became a village.

event.title: came into existence after the Local Government Act of 1894

data.event: The only boundaries which can be traced are the ward boundaries, which came into existence after the Local Government Act of 1894.
